      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method.
        Parameters:
        args - String array.

      • requestEventName

        public java.lang.String requestEventName​(boolean exclusive)
        This method is enchraged of requesting a valid event name according to the situation.
        Parameters:
        exclusive - boolean, if true the event's name return will not exists; otherwise, event's name returned exists.
        Returns:
        a valid name typed by user for adding or consulting an event.

      • requestAuditName

        public java.lang.String requestAuditName​(boolean exclusive)
        This method is enchraged of requesting a valid auditorium name according to the situation.
        Parameters:
        exclusive - boolean, if true the auditorium's name return will not exists; otherwise, auditorium's name returned exists.
        Returns:
        a valid name typed by user for adding or consulting an auditorium.

      • registerEvent

        public void registerEvent()
        Registers an event with the certainty of having valid fields pre: Controller class must have events and auditoriums arraylists already initialized. post: All fields of new event will be valid.

      • registerAuditorium

        public void registerAuditorium()
        Registers an auditorium with the certainty of having valid fields pre: Controller class must have events and auditoriums arraylists already initialized. post: All fields of new auditorium will be valid.

      • reportDefectiveChair

        public void reportDefectiveChair()
        pre: user will type a String where the first character is a letter that is cotained in auditorium's row letters. And the rest of characters are integers greater than 1 and less than the number of columns of auditorium's chairs. post: state of the chair indicated will be seted to deficient.

      • cancelEvent

        public void cancelEvent()
        Canceles an event. post: cancells event indicated with that name;
